displayName.french: Jouez après la tombée de la nuit

description.english: Keep up the magical play!

description.danish: Hold den magiske leg i gang!

description.swedish: Fortsätt det magiska spelet!

description.romanian: Continuă să joci magic!
description.brazilian: Continue a jogar magicamente!

description.english: Go Hog Wild in the dream house.
description.german: Von nun an, gehen Sie wie wild drauf los!
description.french: À partir de maintenant, déchaînez-vous!
description.italian: D'ora in poi, scatena la tua follia!
description.spanish: ¡A partir de ahora, desmelenate!
description.russian: Отныне, пускай все идет как идет!
description.portuguese: A partir de agora, enlouqueça!
description.danish: Fra nu af, gå amok som en gris!
description.dutch: Vanaf nu, ga helemaal los!
description.norwegian: Fra nå av, gå vilt løs!
description.swedish: Från och med nu, gå vild!
description.hungarian: Mostantól engedd szabadjára a vadat!
description.czech: Od teď si užívejte jako prase!
description.romanian: De acum înainte, dă-i drumul!
description.brazilian: A partir de agora, enlouqueça!
description.latam: ¡De ahora en adelante, desmelénate!

description.english: Take flight with this new ball!

description.spanish: ¡Despega con esta nueva bola!
description.portuguese: Levante voo com esta nova bola!
description.danish: Retrieve a samTag flyveturen med denne nye bold!ple from far-flung reaches.
description.dutch: Vlieg met deze nieuwe bal!
description.norwegian: Ta flytur med denne nye ballen!
description.swedish: Ta flyget med denna nya boll!
description.hungarian: Repülj ezzel az új labdával!
description.romanian: Ia zborul cu această minge nouă!
description.brazilian: Levante voo com esta nova bola!
description.latam: ¡Despega con esta nueva bola!

description.english: Things are getting deep…

description.french: Les choses deviennent profondes…
description.italian: Le cose si stanno facendo profonde…
description.spanish: Las cosas se están poniendo profundas…
description.portuguese: As coisas estão ficando profundas…
description.danish: Tingene bliver dybe…
description.dutch: De dingen worden diep…
description.norwegian: Tingene blir dype…
description.swedish: Saker blir djupa…

description.romanian: Lucrurile devin adânci…
description.brazilian: As coisas estão ficando profundas…
description.latam: Las cosas se están poniendo profundas…

description.english: Burn rubber through the next championship!

description.norwegian: Brenn gummi gjennom neste mesterskap!

description.english: Tickle the ivories and bang the drum.

description.english: Gain first-hand experience of each type of transport and hazard.
description.german: Sammeln Sie erste Erfahrungen mit jeder Art von Transport und Hindernis.

description.czech: Získejte 1000 bodů s pinball bumpery jedním úderem.

description.brazilian: Marque 1000 pontos com os bumpers de pinball em um só tiro.

description.english: The farthest distance for a shot to land in the hole.
description.german: Die größte Entfernung, bei der ein Schuss im Loch landet.
description.french: La plus grande distance pour qu'un coup atterrisse dans le trou.
description.italian: La distanza maggiore per un colpo che atterra nella buca.
description.spanish: La mayor distancia para un tiro que caiga en el hoyo.
description.russian: Наибольшее расстояние для удара, чтобы попасть в лунку.
description.portuguese: A maior distância para um tiro cair no buraco.
description.polish: Najdłuższa odległość, na jaką strzał ląduje w dołku.
description.danish: Den længste afstand for et skud til at lande i hullet.
description.dutch: De verste afstand voor een slag om in de hole te landen.
description.finnish: Pisimmän matkan saavuttanut lyönti, joka päätyy reikään.
description.norwegian: Den lengste avstanden for et slag som lander i hullet.
description.swedish: Den längsta avståndet för ett skott att landa i hålet.
description.hungarian: A legnagyobb távolság, amelyre egy ütés lyukba érkezik.
description.czech: Největší vzdálenost, na kterou míček přistane v jamce.
description.romanian: Cea mai mare distanță pentru o lovitură care aterizează în gaură.
description.turkish: Bir vuruşun deliğe düşeceği en uzun mesafe.
description.brazilian: A maior distância para um tiro cair no buraco.
description.ukrainian: Найбільша відстань, з якої удар потрапляє в лунку.
description.latam: La mayor distancia para un tiro que caiga en el hoyo.
